class TextNoNewLine[source]

TextNoNewLine(cache_dir:Optional[str]=None, name:Optional[str]=None, hash:Optional[str]=None, features:Optional[Features]=None, **config_kwargs) :: ArrowBasedBuilder

An ArrowBasedBuilder dataset that doesn't split based on newlines

Parameters:

  • cache_dir : typing.Union[str, NoneType], optional

  • name : typing.Union[str, NoneType], optional

  • hash : typing.Union[str, NoneType], optional

  • features : typing.Union[datasets.features.Features, NoneType], optional

  • config_kwargs : <class 'inspect._empty'>

class TextNoNewLineDatasetReader[source]

TextNoNewLineDatasetReader(path_or_paths:Union[str, bytes, PathLike, List[Union[str, bytes, PathLike]], Dict[str, Union[str, bytes, PathLike]]], split:Optional[NamedSplit]=None, features:Optional[Features]=None, cache_dir:str=None, keep_in_memory:bool=False, **kwargs) :: AbstractDatasetReader

A DatasetReader class that mimics TextDatasetReader, but uses TextNoNewLine

Parameters:

  • path_or_paths : typing.Union[str, bytes, os.PathLike, typing.List[typing.Union[str, bytes, os.PathLike]], typing.Dict[str, typing.Union[str, bytes, os.PathLike]]]

    Paths to texts

  • split : typing.Union[datasets.splits.NamedSplit, NoneType], optional

    Potential dataset splits

  • features : typing.Union[datasets.features.Features, NoneType], optional

    Any features for the datasets

  • cache_dir : <class 'str'>, optional

    A cache directory

  • keep_in_memory : <class 'bool'>, optional

    Whether to keep the dataset completely in memory

  • kwargs : <class 'inspect._empty'>
